ComicInfo.Summary:
THE QUEEN IS DEAD!
The Marauders…the Hellfire Trading Company…all of Krakoa is reeling from the death of Kate Pryde.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------|------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Russell Dauterman & Matthew Wilson | 1 | | Var | Days of Future Past Variant Cover | Javier Rodriguez | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: To Live and Die on Krakoa
